review: First time trying their hazelnut blend and I love the nutty flavor.
If you love coffee this place is a must-visit! They have a variety of blends to choose from.
Excellent atmosphere for studying or working remotely.
This espresso shot woke me up faster than my alarm. So strong!
Would definitely come back again.
I liked the Ice Cold brew, couldn't take too much difference from regular ones though
Cannot find a seat for 3 :(
Perfect balance of milk and espresso.
The item I ordered was out of stock.
Love the seasonal flavors they offer.
Decent coffee.
Loved the seasonal gingerbread latte. Sweet but not too sweet — will be back before the holidays end!.
Great spot for a casual meeting.
The latte art was beautiful!
The barista recommended the vanilla latte and it was delicious.
Good coffee but the seating area was a bit cramped.
The cappuccino was perfect.
A bit pricey.
Fantastic service and amazing coffee! Highly recommend.
Not my favorite roast. It was a little too bitter for my taste.
Can always count on this shop for quick service and great coffee. Never disappoints.
Messed up my order!
I’ve had better coffees, but the staff was so nice I would come back.
Great coffee shop! Always consistent with their brews.
Just okay. Nothing special.
